text: Jaba timi eka arkasita tyasa (jhutha) la'i aphno mukhale carca paricarca garirakheka thiyau ra timi aphno mukhabata tyo sabai kura bhandai ga'irakheka thiyau, jasako visayama timila'i kunai jnana thi'ena ra yadyapi timile tyasala'i e'uta sadharana kura thanirakheka thiyau, tara allahako nikata, tyo e'uta gambhira kuro thiyo
